title: Name this font, pretty please
content:
Anyone know what this font is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155939im_/http:/typophile.com/files/itstime_3816.jpg)
author: edfladung

comments.content:
The best place to identify a font is:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317155939/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
or click on the "Font ID" link at the top of the page.
